title: Circle Curbs Stablecoin Minting for Retail Users, Moving Closer to Tether's Practice
description: USDC issuer Circle Internet Financial said it is curbing support for individual consumer accounts to mint stablecoins, with currently only accepting qualified institutional clients.

title: Solana Launches Tools to Make It Easier to Create Crypto Games
description: Solana Labs' GameShift, a toolkit designed to help developers integrate Solana into video games, is now available in beta.

title: Judge Blocks 'Going Infinite' Excerpt as 'Inadmissible Hearsay' at Sam Bankman-Fried Trial
description: While Michael Lewis’ book flew under the radar, the prosecution put a spotlight on Zeke Faux’s “Number Go Up.”

title: Bitcoin price surge to $35,000 triggers over $1.5B in profit-taking
description:

title: AI-Powered Cameras Uncover Insightful Data on E-Scooter Riding Behavior
description: Dott, the leading micro-mobility operator in Europe, has recently revealed groundbreaking insights from its latest research utilizing AI-powered cameras installed on their shared e-scooters. title: Concerns Arise Over President Biden’s Executive Order on AI Regulation
description: In a recent executive order, President Joe Biden has taken steps to regulate the development of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, citing potential risks and dangers. title: Spain Fast-Forwards MiCA Adoption in Response to EU Pressure
description:
Crypto firms registered in Spain would be required to apply the EU crypto law, Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) Act, by December 2025, according to reports. That would mean that the country would bring forward the law’s implementation by six months and would likely affect already registered crypto companies like Binance, Kraken, and Coinbase. Per […]

The post Spain Fast-Forwards MiCA Adoption in Response to EU Pressure appeared first on Coin Edition.
